comments: Number of edges of the complete tripartite graph of order 7n, K_n,n,5n - _Roberto E. Martinez II_, Jan 07 2002Number of edges of the complete tripartite graph of order 6n, K_n,2n,3n - _Roberto E. Martinez II_, Jan 07 200211 times the squares. [From _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 13 2008]
formula: a(n) = A000290(n)*11. [From _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 13 2008]a(n)=22*n+a(n-1)-11 (with a(0)=0) [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 05 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
